alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:16PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tooele County through 800 PM MDT... At 715 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Utah Test and Training Range South, or 32 miles east of Wendover, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clive, Knolls and Utah Test and Training Range South. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 36 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
